name: lynda.com Article Center | Celebrate 12 Days of Learning — with Free Online Courses
caption: lynda.com
description: Stuck indoors? Need a break from holiday revelry? Join us at lynda.com, where we’re celebrating 12 Days of Learning by offering 12 free online courses over the next 12 days.
